title: The World's Best Countries that are calling out to you in 2015 (Saurav Mishra)
text: By Saurav Mishra Aug 8, 2015 Planning a sojourn abroad? Here are some of the best countries that you need to explore before the year comes to an end: Italy - If you want picturesque sceneries and a welcoming atmosphere this is the time to visit Italy and its legendary cities of Rome, Venice, Milan, Florence and Sicily. From fairytale lakes to stunning mountaintop hamlets, beautiful beaches, desert islands, and the all consuming magnificence of its basilicas, Italy has everything to offer. Experience it all in one go with the country's superb intercity train network which takes you from one city to another at a breeze. Italy is definitely among the best countries to visit this year. Sri Lanka - Big things come in small packages is so true of this small island which offers a larger than life experience. Saunter in its golden beaches, ride the mighty waves, revel in its majestic past and enjoy the sights of misty mountains and lush tea gardens as elephants roam the countryside. A diverse cultural heritage, delightful food, unique assortment of sweetmeats and all through the year festivities will ensure your holiday is engaging to say the least. Sri Lanka is definitely one of the world's best countries to visit. Barbados - Barbados is a dream Caribbean destination which should definitely be on your list of countries to visit in 2015. Enticing tourists all year round, its doors are open to people of all ages who want to give themselves up to fun and leisure. Its peaceful beaches and crystal-clear waters beckons underwater and water sport lovers. Barbados also offers a fresh breath of scenic countryside which is beyond compare. Bask in the glory of this island, take an enriching tour of its black culture and heritage or revel in night long parties the true Barbadian way. Oman - This tiny country in the Middle East lying at the mouth of the Persian Gulf has the ability to blow your mind away. What would you give to traverse the golden sands of time or laze around in secluded beaches and wallow around in warm waters? Oman is an ocean lover's paradise. If that doesn't get you then maybe its mountainous setting, some breathtaking underground caves and ancient architecture amidst a western cityscape will. Experience the kindness and hospitality of the Omani people wherever you go and whet your appetite with mouth-watering meat delicacies like never before. Iceland - Don't let the cold and ice deter you from traveling to this magical land of the northern lights. If you're lucky, you'll get to witness one of the most jaw-dropping sights of mystical green lights dancing in the winter sky. Lava beaches, drifting icebergs and steaming geysers amidst snow covered mountains are a sight to behold. Iceland has much to offer in its dazzling landscapes as it does in its natural wonders making it assuredly one of the world's best countries to visit. About the Author Saurav Mishra is a well known travel blogger and have a great knowledge when it comes to traveling and exploring countries. In this article he focus over best countries to visit around the world. Know one more about countries to visit in 2015 . Rating:
